text: Gil Hodges (April 4, 1924 â€“ April 2, 1972) was a baseball player and manager. He was a player on the Brooklyn Dodgers and the New York Mets. Then he was a manager for the Mets. Hodges was the manager of the 1969 mets. He also was a player for the 1955 Dodgers.
